title: From A $100 Microphone To Millions Of Downloads: Top Tips For Building A Raving Podcast Audience
author: Stephanie Burns, Contributor
excerpt: Angie Lee, entrepreneur and the founder and host of the wildly popular podcast The Angie Lee Show, says that fear should be the last thing that stops you from following the desire to just begin… whether it’s the fear of no one showing up or the fear of being embarrassed.
